trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Coeur d'Alene
There were no other sightings in Coeur d'Alene on or around January 16th 1967
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking towards the southwest ( the Spokane area )toward the horizon after the sunset. I didn't see it in tell it light up then it fell about five hundred feet ( very bright ) slowed as it fell, then flashed out. I watched the area it fell for about an hour ( there were radio towers in the area it fell ) and all the while there were small lights ( very dim but visable ) shooting off about every five to eight minutes. Thats all I saw, but this was no falling star or rock it had a controlled desent but it happened so fast I couldn't take a picture( the story of my life ).
Summary: Round, bright, none streeking. There was no tracer light.
